name: Musical Towers
description:
In this game you have to move the block either left or right in sync with the beat. You get scored based on how close you are to the beat, your combo, and matching the block colour gives you a significant score multiplier!

Day 1 of making games daily.

The making of the game.

Song: Maybe Now - Dovetail (Licensed from EpidemicSound)

Font: Heartbit by Void
